performances.venue: Fillmore East New York City, NY
performances.description: A good version dispite a flub or two
A lot of versions are muddled. This one is real clear, and pretty. 2nd best after the Family Dog version.

performances.venue: Family Dog at the Great Highway San Francisco, CA
performances.description: my number one fave. The best sounding, clearest, nicest one BY FAR.
Upvote for all Little Sadies, of course, but this one is special. Subtle, understated, and delicate: Jerry is barely whispering the lyrics. Beautiful.
One of only three known versions

performances.venue: Radio City Music Hall New York, NY
